name: Pop Punk
description: Blends the loud, fast-paced sound of Punk Rock with the melodic hooks of Pop.

children.name: Easycore
children.description: Combines the radio-friendly stylings of second-wave Pop Punk with Metalcore-inspired breakdowns, lower guitar tunings, and occasional unclean vocals.

children.name: Seishun Punk
children.description: Short-lived Japanese style popular in the early 2000s, characterized by a raw and abrasive style, Folk-inspired songwriting, and youth-oriented straightforward lyrics.
